About the Company: Tantia Constructions Ltd is a core infrastructure company.A pioneer in creating infrastructure in Eastern India.The company has established their credentials in the field of construction, widening, conversion, maintenance, strengthening and beautification of roadways, road bridges, highways and flyovers. The business areas of the company are namely Roads and highways,Railway infrastructure,Urban infrastructure,Aviation infrastructure,Marine infrastructure and Power transmission..The company also in the business activities of Infrastructure, Ready Mix Concrete.
